title: Apple Pay NFC input restrictions land Apple in trouble with the EU
content:
The European Commission has sent a “Statement of Objections” to Apple over its alleged anti-competitive practices regarding NFC input for payments. In the statement, the EU notes that it takes issue with Apple’s decision to prevent third-party apps from accessing NFC input for contactless payments on its devices.
